column2: ConocoPhillips plans new well in Alaska national reserve ANCHORAGE
column4: Aug 9 ConocoPhillips  has applied for permits to develop a new field in the National Petroleum Reserve in Alaska
column5: a vast unit of federal land that has yet to yield commercially produced oil
column6: according to the federal agency managing the reserve.

column2: Oracle Team USA admits rules violations
column4: Aug 9 Oracle Team USA admitted it had violated the official rules on yacht modifications and would withdraw retroactively from the last four AC World Series regattas
column5: which are part of the lead-up to the final America's Cup race.
